title: Kinda Funny Studios Launch Hype Intro Video
description:
Watch us all day at
http://www.twitch.tv/kindafunnygames


New look. Same idiots.


Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub...

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, Colin Moriarty, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

transcript_chunks.text: I'm ready. Come on. I'm addicted to the thrill. It's a dangerous love. Can't be scared when it goes down. Got a problem. Tell me now. The only thing that's on my mind is who going to run this town. We are. Yeah I said it. We are. This is Rock Nation. Pledge with Legion. It's your T song. All black everything. Black cards. Black cars. All black everything. And I get more int. If you boys really explain later but for now let me get back to this paper. I'm a couple down and I'm trying to get back. I gave nothing grip. I lost a flip for five stacks. We took five six zero shot zero back in the air. And there are dangerous victories within the mouth. I'm dead. Don't give a damn. Who going to run this town tonight?
